alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Far Northeast Highlands; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Northeast Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 24 at 3:27AM MST until November 25 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations generally between 2 and 5 inches. * WHERE...East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains, Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass, Far Northeast Highlands, Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass, and Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 1 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Tire traction will be reduced. Extend the distance between your vehicle and the vehicle in front of you. This includes portions of I-25 and could impact holiday travelers.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Far Northeast Highlands; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Northeast Highlands
